# preferredDevice

**Instance Property**

The device object that the system recommends using for this layer.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredDevice: (any MTLDevice)? { get }
```

## Discussion

On systems with a single GPU, this method returns the default device object; see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLCreateSystemDefaultDevice()]. On systems with more than one GPU, this method returns the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] that was last used to composite and present the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAMetalLayer]. This device object usually corresponds to the GPU associated with the screen that’s displaying the layer. If you set the layer’s [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAMetalLayer/device] property to this device object, you reduce the number of cross-GPU texture copies that Core Animation must perform to present the layer’s contents onscreen.

## Configuring the Metal Device

- **device**: The Metal device responsible for the layer’s drawable resources.
